charaepi_ch0118_50_lillie/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] headed up the
mountain to meet Lillie, who had invited [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ] to
watch the moon together.
charaepi_ch0118_50_lillie/2301_1201_0200:
You know what? Walking around here reminds me
of Vast Poni Canyon.
charaepi_ch0118_50_lillie/2301_0401_0400:
It’s a famous but dangerous mountain path
in Alola.
charaepi_ch0118_50_lillie/2301_0402_0600:
I went through a bit of a trial there. Even though
it was tough, it’s a special memory of mine.
charaepi_ch0118_50_lillie/2301_1201_0700:
There’s a legend that says that you can reach an
entirely different world through the sacred altar
in Vast Poni Canyon.
charaepi_ch0118_50_lillie/2301_1201_0800:
I went there to go after my mother after she went
off to another dimension!
charaepi_ch0118_50_lillie/2301_0401_1100: Yes! And one of my best friends!
charaepi_ch0118_50_lillie/2301_0402_1300: Thanks! I think Nebby really likes it, too!
charaepi_ch0118_50_lillie/2301_1201_1400:
Now, I’ve entrusted Nebby to a Trainer I know I
can rely on.
charaepi_ch0118_50_lillie/2301_1201_1500:
Oh, and this Lunala was a Cosmog that Trainer
gave me!
charaepi_ch0118_50_lillie/2301_1201_1600:
We kept going on adventures together, and it
evolved into Lunala!
charaepi_ch0118_50_lillie/2301_1201_1700:
I really admire Nebby and that Trainer, so I try to
be more like them!
charaepi_ch0118_50_lillie/2301_1201_1800:
One day, I hope they can watch me and Lunala
as we battle in a big match! That’s one of
my goals!
charaepi_ch0118_50_lillie/2301_0401_2000:
Yeah! I feel like we’d be invincible together,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0118_50_lillie/2301_0402_2200:
I believe I can, too! Believing is what makes
us stronger!
charaepi_ch0118_50_lillie/2301_1201_2300: Whew... We finally made it to the summit.
charaepi_ch0118_50_lillie/2301_1201_2400: But...the moon must be hiding behind those clouds.
charaepi_ch0118_50_lillie/2301_1201_2500:
Lunala... Clefairy... I hope you aren’t
too disappointed.
charaepi_ch0118_50_lillie/2301_1201_2800:
I read about this in a book before! Lunala used
to be known as the beast that calls the moon.
charaepi_ch0118_50_lillie/2301_1201_2900:
When Lunala spreads its wings, it shines
gorgeously like a crescent moon in the night sky.
charaepi_ch0118_50_lillie/2301_1201_3400:
That was something I read in a book, but now
it’s happening right in front of me!
charaepi_ch0118_50_lillie/2301_1201_3500:
When I was younger, I was always just at home,
imagining what things were like from the books
I read.
charaepi_ch0118_50_lillie/2301_1201_3600:
But I don’t think books will be enough for me
anymore! I want to experience those things in
person now!
charaepi_ch0118_50_lillie/2301_1201_4100: I think I’ll always remember what I saw today.
charaepi_ch0118_50_lillie/2301_1201_4200:
I had a great time exploring here with you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! And you, too,
Clefairy and Lunala!
charaepi_ch0118_50_lillie/2301_1201_4300:
From now on, I’m going to let this memory shine
within me, bright like the moon!
